original_title: Sri Lanka – China Friendship Association donates medicines to Apeksha Cancer Hospital
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka – China Friendship Association (SLCFA) on Friday donated drugs worth 4 million to Apeksha Cancer Hospital Children Hospital at the Ministry of Health.  Chief Guests were People’s Republic of China to Sri Lanka Ambassador oQi Zhenhong and Health Secretary S. Janaka Sri Chandraguptha. SLCFA President Ananda Goonatilleke was also present – Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
